title: Best Quotes of Week: 2014 OHL Classic
headline: Best Quotes of Week: 2014 OHL Classic
description: Lee Trevino on why Tiger has to go it alone, John Daly on Tom Watson, Christina Kim on how she got Sergio's waggle, Ian Poulter on missing that putt, and the Navy Seal who killed Osama Bin Laden on how golf is more stressful than combat.
short_headline: Best Quotes of Week: 2014 OHL Classic
page_title: Best Quotes of Week: 2014 OHL Classic
slug: Best Quotes of Week: 2014 OHL Classic
body: Lee Trevino on why Tiger has to go it alone, John Daly on Tom Watson, Christina Kim on how she got Sergio's waggle, Ian Poulter on missing that putt, and the Navy Seal who killed Osama Bin Laden on how golf is more stressful than combat.
